text: Nikita Porshnev (born 5 March 1996) is a Russian biathlete. He competed at the Biathlon World Championships 2019, winning a medal.Relay results ==Biathlon results== All results are sourced from the International Biathlon Union. ===World Championships=== 1 medal (1 bronze) {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center;" |- " !Event !style="width:70px;"|Individual !style="width:70px;"|Sprint !style="width:70px;"|Pursuit !style="width:70px;"| !style="width:70px;"|Relay !style="width:70px;"| !Single mixed relay |- | align=left| 2019 Östersund | 36th | — | — | — | style="background:#cfaa88;" |Bronze | — | — |} :*During Olympic seasons competitions are only held for those events not included in the Olympic program. :**The single mixed relay was added as an event in 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male biathletes Category:Sportspeople from Saratov Category:Biathlon World Championships medalists Category:Universiade medalists in biathlon Category:Universiade gold medalists for Russia Category:Universiade silver medalists for Russia Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Russia Category:Competitors at the 2019 Winter Universiade
title: Nikita Porshnev
